amendment.description: Amendment increased funding for the Federal Aviation Administration William J. Hughes Technical Center located in Pomona, New Jersey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. LoBiondo.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
